name: Crafty Nectar
slogan: Craft Cider Subscription Service and Wholesale
description:
The UK's 1st Craft Cider Subscription Box. Discover new craft ciders, expertly crafted for you & delivered fresh to your door each month.

The craft cider revolution has begun with the market is booming in the UK with sales approaching £1.9bn. 

Forget craft beer, this is the REAL growth market. We hope to expand quickly to the U.S. market after gaining an extensive market share.

- the UK's 1st (and only) cider subscription club
- 74,000 social followers
- the world's biggest craft cider community
- Averaging a YOY growth rate of 108%

Supporting local cider producers, we make sure our cider have the highest juice content, are gluten-free and are FINALLY accessible to everybody in the UK. Providing small producers the National platform they deserve. 

Join us on the craft cider revolution!

We also now offer a wholesale side of the business in which pubs, restaurants and clubs can buy craft cider directly from the cider makers themselves.

jobs.title: Summer Digital Internship - High Growth Drinks Startup
jobs.description:
Passion for cider, tech, and innovation? Want to drink on the job?


Come and join the craft cider revolution with CRAFTY NECTAR!


We’re the UK’s No.1 online retailer for craft cider. We started as a subscription club to connect people of the UK with real cider. Our customers can discover new craft ciders, expertly crafted & delivered fresh to their door each month. We have since expanded to trade (delivering to pubs, restaurants and bars!) and even launched our own award winning cider range last year!


Currently one of the most exciting drink startups in the UK and we need your help. 

Your cider-tern role:


Growing our community through social media, content marketing, and visual marketing. Day to day you’ll be producing fun viral content so you must be a good writer, capable of producing fun, engaging content, and with an excellent understanding of social media marketing. With strong copywriting skills as well as basic graphic design skills, social media is your natural space to inhabit. It will also be second nature to dive into analytics, compose posts that follow a long-term strategy,


You’ll also be creating videos via IG and facebook live and will be the powerhouse behind our brand. Oh, and indulging in some cider tasting, selling and much more at food & blogging events. We want creative people who are passionate about what they do.


Role:


* Produce amazing imagery and video content that will drive our Social Media Growth

* Serve as editor-in-chief for all content to ensure quality, clarity and consistency

* Generate creative ideas for fresh content and features
Write engaging and relevant blog posts

* Lead our social media presence and online forums, providing content and managing/facilitating conversation

* Collect, monitor and analyse social and website metrics, and make improvements and suggestions to future content and strategy accordingly

Who we’re looking for:


We expect you to get stuck in. In return, our team will give you all the support you need. We want you to amaze us with your passion and scare us with your ability to get stuff done.


Requirements:

* Experience managing and growing social communities
* Customer acquisition strategies
* Videography and video editing
* Photoshop or excellent image creation skills
* Experience in online performance marketing with a specific focus on paid search (Google AdWords) and paid social (Facebook/Instagram)
* Attention to detail and accuracy

We’re building a team who are ready to:


* Constantly Learn
* Work hard
* Are Remote
* Take Risks

Ideally remote working but we also have a space in an office at a TechHub in Wimbledon. We are looking to recruit an Intern for a 3 month placement, working 4 days a week. Hours can be negotiated if necessary


We offer:

* Exceptional and unique experience within a fast paced, exciting startup
* Paid & Travel expenses covered for duration of internship
* Great reference and value for your CV
* Full-time employment after the 3 month internship – subject to review. (equity options & average £18K start)

Remote working opportunities also available.


If you’re interested, please email your CV and an attached writing sample (150-250 words) and we’ll be in touch!
